column3: was a Hobbits of the Shire.

column2: Ruby married Fosco Baggins. They had three children: Dora Baggins

column1: Perhaps its not unintentional that a Hobbit woman with a jewel-name married into the Baggins family
column2: recently made rich by Bilbos travels. Both Rubys marriage and name are consistent with the Bolgers being of a higher class.

column1: The name of the ruby derives from Latin http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/rubeus rubeus meaning "red".http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/ruby#Etymology_1 Wiktionary entry
